content: *** 6 Stars *** Free version worked good. But the floating head in the paid version beats having to set all the apps individually. First app I actually paid for. A whopping 99Â¢ Many thanks to Pranav, for developing this app. At that price, I hope you're selling many copies.
replyContent:
Hello Barry! Thank you so much for your support.

Yes, I started the development in 2014 with a similar thought but things didn't go as planned. I think we have just started and I am still hopeful about the future of the Rotation app. Thanks again for your support and please feel free to contact me via email.

content: Seems to be able to handle exactly what I wanted - not change how my phone behaves / works in any way other than to force one or two apps that I have to always be in landscape mode (something the the developers or management of those apps should have included as functionality of their app themselves). App is not the prettiest, but I did get it to do what I wanted no problem. Also the app is only $1.49 so the price is right too. Good job Pranav! Cheers
replyContent:
Hello! Thank you very much for the detailed feedback, I will do my best to improve it further.

Please feel free to contact me via email in case of any issues or to provide suggestions.

content: There are many reasons for rotation management, but mostly it is needed to make up for amateur programmers who know enough to be dangerous. Google guidelines state that, except for very good reasons, apps should handle all orientations (if only portrait, then support reverse portrait as well). Programming is not easy and not everyone should try. Apps like this exist to make up for ineptitude, and thankfully, they do. So, Rotation-Orientation Manager gets full marks! It's the best I've used.
Excellent product
i hope the app have tile toggle on (auto rotate),. toggle off ( lock rotation) i still need two tiles for doing simple things like that...
It's kinda difficult to use. No explanation for all the different rotation settings.
replyContent: Hello Tim! Sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please try to explain what you are trying to do. I have already tried my best to explain every feature. Please check Rotation --- Help for more info. You can also contact me via email for better support.

content: Worth the support
replyContent: Hello Jelle! Thank you very much for your support.

content: a bit confusing at first because So Many Options. don't fret. imagine yr ideal method of controlling rotation, then look for a way to do it. you'll probably be successful. widgets, notification menu, per-app setting,etc--it's all there. ME: i use a program that detects long press of volume button to toggle the rotation service on/off.
replyContent: Hello Elsa! Thank you very much for your support and detailed review.

replyContent: EDIT: - Hello Robin! It will not show up in the launcher. It will unlock 3 more features in the main app (Search for "Rotation - Orientation Manager") which must be installed. Please follow these steps to make it working in MIUI. Security - Settings - Permissions - Permissions - Rotation - Enable Display pop-up window. Kindly update your review.

replyContent: Hello Sydney, Go to "About & Support --- Support --- Reset to default" to revert everything to normal settings. You can contact me via email via "Report a bug" option.

Clean user interface, easy to use, packed with features, at an affordable price. Thank you Pranav, we need more Android developer like you! By the way, please also add 'sensor-portrait' (instead of just sensor-landscape) ð
App settings not working, notification quick menu not showing up most of the time.
replyContent: Hello Lorenz, I have tested it on all NEXUS devices and its working fine. Go to Settings (Phone) --- Security --- Apps with usage access and enable Rotation there. Then, enable Advanced algorithm under Rotation Advance settings. Per App Settings should work after that. Please contact me via email for more info.

content: Lg g3 service does not rotate home screen after closing an app and returning to home. I tried everything. Defeats the purpose of buying the app. Also there are WAY TOO many options. This app is a little overkill for most people. May be good for gamers..
replyContent: Hello John! Thanks for your feedback. New update is coming soon with so many improvements. For now, Go to About & Support --- Support --- Reset to default. It will fix most of the issues. User satisfaction is more important for me, if you want refund then, send me your order no. via email.

content: Great tool
